long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wiser Plus: View Professor Ratings Inside Wiser

Make informed course decisions without extra searches. Wiser Plus integrates professor ratings right into Wiser, providing an invaluable tool for students. Trusted by thousands of students, Wiser Plus aims to make your academic life easier and smarter.

Discord: https://discord.gg/pF8ruTQTee

==============================
FEATURES

☆ View real-time professor ratings directly on Wiser course listings
☆ Save time by not having to switch between tabs or apps to check professor reviews
☆ Get insights on teaching styles, course difficulty, and more—all without leaving Wiser
☆ Access user-generated content to understand what you're getting into before you register
☆ Filter ratings by various categories like helpfulness, clarity, and easiness
☆ Keep your ratings and reviews personalized with an optional user account
☆ Benefit from an intuitive, user-friendly interface designed for students, by students
☆ Get quick support and answers from the Wiser Plus team

==============================
ABOUT

Download Wiser Plus’s free extension to bring professor ratings to your fingertips. Just click "Add to Chrome," then go to Wiser and watch as professor ratings seamlessly integrate into your course search.

Wiser Plus believes that every student should have easy access to the information they need to make smart course choices. That's why we've created a tool that works automatically, giving you crucial information right where you need it.

==============================
NOTES

* The notice you see about having access to your academic records or course information is automatically generated because Wiser Plus runs on Wiser tabs. However, Wiser Plus does NOT monitor your academic history or require your personal information to work properly. Our sole purpose is to provide you with transparent information to make your academic life easier.
